welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Pendleton, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes. We are excited to have you here and invite you to experience all the wonders this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pendleton Airport houses all ticketing and baggage claim services for commercial airlines.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Pendleton Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at State Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at State Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
